verbose_text: Consistent with our in silico analysis, we further found that activation of sapienate metabolism correlated with an increase in SCD1 expression and SCD1 mediated palmitoleate metabolism in U87 glioblastoma cells overexpressing SREBP-1 or SREBP-2 (XREF_FIG D-4F).
evidence: SCD1 expression and SCD1-mediated palmitoleate metabolism in U87 glioblastoma cells overexpressing SREBP-1
